com.facebook.react.bridge

类 CxxModuleWrapperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.CxxModuleWrapperBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NativeModule
    直接已知子类:
    CxxModuleWrapper

    public class CxxModuleWrapperBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements NativeModule
    A Java Object which represents a cross-platform C++ module This module implements the NativeModule interface but will never be invoked from Java, instead the underlying Cxx module will be extracted by the bridge and called directly.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 com.facebook.react.bridge.NativeModule

        NativeModule.NativeMethod

      boolean canOverrideExistingModule()
      Return true if you intend to override some other native module that was registered e.g. as part of a different package (such as the core one).
      java.lang.String getName() 
      void initialize()
      This is called at the end of CatalystApplicationFragment#createCatalystInstance() after the CatalystInstance has been created, in order to initialize NativeModules that require the CatalystInstance or JS modules.

      Called before {CatalystInstance#onHostDestroy}

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 NativeModule
        返回:
        the name of this module. This will be the name used to require() this module from javascript.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        从接口复制的说明: NativeModule
        This is called at the end of CatalystApplicationFragment#createCatalystInstance() after the CatalystInstance has been created, in order to initialize NativeModules that require the CatalystInstance or JS modules.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 NativeModule

      • canOverrideExistingModule

        public boolean canOverrideExistingModule()
        从接口复制的说明: NativeModule
        Return true if you intend to override some other native module that was registered e.g. as part of a different package (such as the core one). Trying to override without returning true from this method is considered an error and will throw an exception during initialization. By default all modules return false.
        指定者:
        canOverrideExistingModule 在接口中 NativeModule

      • onCatalystInstanceDestroy

        public void onCatalystInstanceDestroy()
        从接口复制的说明: NativeModule
        Called before {CatalystInstance#onHostDestroy}
        指定者:
        onCatalystInstanceDestroy 在接口中 NativeModule

        protected void resetModule(HybridData hd)
